ovdesc.p: The SWAP.BALANCES.HIST file stores the reversed versions of Swap balance records (SWAP.BALANCES).
For further information with regard to this file and its' associated fields, please see SWAP.BALANCES helptext.

desc.p: Fields ACCR.FROM.DATE to ACCR.ACT.AMT form a related multi value set. Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

It holds the principal outstanding in local currency.
All principal movements will update this field.

Fields ACCR.FROM.DATE to ACCR.ACT.AMT form a related multi value set. Standard T24 amount field.
A maximum of 19 characters may be entered.
A maximum of 2 characters may be entered.

This field will only become populated when the leg of the swap contract has undergone the currency revaluation processing. The leg of the swap contract must meet all of the following criteria to undergo the currency revaluation processing;
1) The contract must be OFF balance sheet. 2) The leg must be non notional. 3) The currency of the leg must not be the local currency.
When a leg of a swap contract has undergone the currency revaluation processing, this field will hold the exchange rate which was applicable to the currency at the time the leg became non notional.
Standard T24 rate field.

This field holds the net amount which has been posted as unrealised P&L in local currency.
The amount is derived by the formula:- Principal outstanding * (current.xrate - initial.xrate)
